alert.note: Alert for Dubuque (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 01 at 3:12AM CST until January 02 at 12:00AM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. * WHERE...In Iowa, Dubuque County. In Illinois, Stephenson and Jo Daviess Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 for Iowa, or by visiting 511ia.org, modot.org, or idot.Illinois.gov.
